  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_447</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_447</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Inversión</string>
            <string language="en">Inversion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inversion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inversion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inversione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιστροφή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de inversión geométrica. Se estudia la manera de calcular la inversión de puntos, rectas, circunferencias y otras curvas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of geometric inversion. The unit studies how to invert points, lines, circumferences and other curves.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">circunferencia</string>
            <string language="en">circumference</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta</string>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">punto</string>
            <string language="en">point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inversión</string>
            <string language="en">inversion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der geometrischen Umstellung zu erklären. 
Die Maßeinheit studiert, wie man Punkte, Zeilen, Umkreise und 
andere Kurven umkehrt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de l'inversion géométrique. 
L'unité étudie comment inverser des points, des lignes, des 
circonférences et d'autres courbes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do inversion geométrico. A unidade estuda como 
inverter pontos, linhas, circunferências e outras curvas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto dell'inversione geometrica. L'unità studia
come invertire i punti, le righe, le circonferenze ed altre curve.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της γεωμετρικής αντιστροφής. Οι 
μελέτες μονάδων πώς να αναστρέψει τα σημεία, τις γραμμές, τα 
circumferences και άλλες καμπύλες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
